publicationStmt.publisher: To the Reader: The English Preface in Print, c. 1475-1640 / Early English Books Online Text Creation Partnership

monogr.title: An answer to Maister H. Iacob his defence of the churches and ministery of England. By Francis Iohnson an exile of Iesus Christ
monogr.author: Johnson, Francis

div.p: The Title and inscription of Mr Iacobs book (because there is often relation vnto it hereafter, both in the Preface, and in the Book it selff, therefore) I thought good here to insert it at first. Thus it was, word for word, as followeth:

q.p: [A DEFENCE OF THE CHVRCHES AND Ministery of England.
Written in two Treatises, against the Reasons and obiections of Mr Francis Iohnson, and others of the separation commonly called Brownists.
Published, especially, for the benefit of those in these parts of the lovv Countries.
MIDDELBVRGH. By Richard Schilders, Printer to the States of Zealand. 1599.]
